channel.title: Help me on Java 1.6
channel.description:
[code]['Java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]
Its kind of obviouse this is going around for a lot of people but seriously. The people who do know why, just say it! Why does this error
appear. I have posted this many times and people just leave it go! Please just help us. I have tried all the jdk's 1 by 1. Each dont work!
Please try to help. Thank you.

item.title: Help me on Java 1.6
item.dc:creator: @Play_N_Skillz Play N Skillz
item.description:
@Play_N_Skillz wrote:

“javac” which is telling java to compile cannot, because, either you installed it wrong, or your codes are not set to fit your java type in your compile.bat and runserver.bat files.

You probably have something like 1.6.0 in your files, when you have JDK 6u1 installed. Change it to 1.6.0_01.
I hope you know what I’m talking about… I’m not the type of person who goes into major details…

Read full topic

item.title: Help me on Java 1.6
item.dc:creator: @killer_numba_1 killer numba 1
item.description:
@killer_numba_1 wrote:

[code][‘Java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

[/code]

Its kind of obviouse this is going around for a lot of people but seriously. The people who do know why, just say it! Why does this error

appear. I have posted this many times and people just leave it go! Please just help us. I have tried all the jdk’s 1 by 1. Each dont work!

Please try to help. Thank you.
